body:
### About me

Hi all,
I am a Computer Science Student at University of Trento and I work as web developer at FBK - ICT4G Research Unit.
I love Ruby language and Ruby on Rails web framework and recently I made a "Introduction to Ruby on Rails" course. If you want you can find all resoruces in the repo of the course.

***

My interests includes solving rubik's cube, reading books. I also enjoy playing football and swimming.
name: Andrea's Homepage
tagline: A passionate student and web programmer.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
